name: Follow Me (HasanKlncc, SuperI2Dev)
description:
On the evening of the birthday party, our balloon is blowing out the window with the wind and we are trying to find it.

Made in 2 days for Weekly Game Jam - Week 215

Made By

HasanKlncc && SuperI2Dev

Controls

Movement - W A S D

 Look - Mouse 

 Interact - E

SPOİLER

The balloon actually represents death. We're playing a man's last minutes.
